full_summary:
### Government Tender Notification
#### Request for Proposal: ERT Vests
================================================================================

**Tender Reference:** WS4283013044-Doc4391250641

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for the commercial purchase of Emergency Response Team (ERT) vests. The objective is to acquire high-quality, commercially available protective vests that provide spike and ballistic protection to predetermined levels.

**Key Requirements:**
* Protection from spike and ballistic threats to specified levels
* Reasonable blunt force protection for covered areas
* Conformity to Canadian standards for similar products

**Subject:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Delivery Location:** Correctional Services of Canada Regional Supply Depot, 33344 King Road, Abbotsford, BC V2S 5X7

The requested deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2024.

**Procurement Information:**
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Contact Information:**
* **Contact Person:** Katie Wong (elle-la / she-her), Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:katie.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** Not provided

For more information, please visit the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18494237?extsite=MTg0OTQyMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18494237?extsite=MTg0OTQyMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Modification History:** 2 amendments have been made to this tender notice. 
**Modification Date:** January 25, 2024 
**Tender Closing Date:** January 30, 2024 02:00 PM EST. (Tender has expired)

Please note that you have gone over the 400 word limit. I can suggest deleting the last 3 bullet points if it keeps with your original intent.
